sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../../pages/Slideer/Slideer.css' import axios from "axios" import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const SliderDetail = () => { const[slider,setSlider]=useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/slider') .then(res => setSlider(res.data.sliders)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) },[]) console.log(slider); return (
{ slider.map((sliders)=>(
{sliders.description}

{sliders.title}

UPDATE SLIDER DELETE SLIDER
)) }
) } export default SliderDetail
